titles.title: A resolution to refer S.1325 entitled "A bill for the relief of Horace Martin," to the Chief Judge of the United States Claims Court for a report thereon.
A resolution to refer S. 1325 entitled "A bill for the relief of Horace Martin", to the Chief Judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims for a report thereon.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10002)
Referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.
Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice. Approved for full committee consideration with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Biden with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 686.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/30/1993--Introduced. Refers S. 1325, a bill for the relief of a named individual, to the chief judge of the United States Court of Federal Claims.
